io.hyphenate.server.api

Interface ChatRoomAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HyphenateChatRoom

    public interface ChatRoomAPI
    This interface is created for REST API of Chat Room, it should be synchronized with the API list.
    See Also:
    http://docs.hyphenate.io
